verses.verse: For as <S%G4012>touching<s%> the <S%G1248>ministering<s%> to the <S%G40>saints,<s%> it is <S%G4053>superfluous<s%> for me to <S%G1125>write<s%> to you:

For I <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G4288>forwardness<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4288>mind,<s%> for <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2744>boast<s%> of you to them of <S%G3110>Macedonia,<s%> that <S%G882>Achaia<s%> was <S%G3903>ready<s%> a <S%G4070>year<s%> <S%G575>ago;<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2205>zeal<s%> has <S%G2042>provoked<s%> <S%G4119>very<s%> <S%G4119>many.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> have I <S%G3992>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3588>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> our <S%G2745>boasting<s%> of you should be in <S%G2761>vain<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>behalf;<s%> that, as I <S%G3004>said,<s%> you may be <S%G3903>ready:<s%>

<S%G3381>Lest<s%> <S%G3381>haply<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they of <S%G3110>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> with me, and <S%G2147>find<s%> you <S%G532>unprepared,<s%> we (that we <S%G3004>say<s%> not, you) should be <S%G2617>ashamed<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G5026>same<s%> <S%G5287>confident<s%> <S%G2746>boasting.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> I <S%G2233>thought<s%> it <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3870>exhort<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that they would <S%G4281>go<s%> <S%G4281>before<s%> to you, and <S%G4294>make<s%> up <S%G4293>beforehand<s%> your <S%G2129>bounty,<s%> whereof you had <S%G4293>notice<s%> before, that the <S%G5026>same<s%> might be <S%G2092>ready,<s%> as a matter of <S%G2129>bounty,<s%> and not as of <S%G4124>covetousness.<s%>

But <S%G5124>this<s%> I say, He which <S%G4687>sows<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5340>sparingly;<s%> and he which <S%G4687>sows<s%> <S%G2129>bountifully<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2129>bountifully.<s%>

<S%G1538>Every<s%> man <S%G2531>according<s%> as he <S%G4255>purposes<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> so let him give; not <S%G1537>grudgingly,<s%> <S%G3077><s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G318>necessity:<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> a <S%G2431>cheerful<s%> <S%G1395>giver.<s%>

And <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G4052>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you; that you, <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G841>sufficiency<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things, may <S%G4052>abound<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work:<s%>

(As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He has <S%G4650>dispersed<s%> <S%G4650>abroad;<s%> he has <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G3993>poor:<s%> his <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G3306>remains<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he that <S%G2023>ministers<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> to the <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5524>minister<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> for your <S%G1035>food,<s%> and <S%G4129>multiply<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4703>seed<s%> sown, and <S%G837>increase<s%> the <S%G1081>fruits<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%>)

Being <S%G4148>enriched<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> thing to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G572>bountifulness,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2716>causes<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> us <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For the <S%G1248>administration<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3009>service<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4322>supplies<s%> the <S%G5303>want<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> but is <S%G4052>abundant<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> by <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgivings<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%>

Whiles by the <S%G1382>experiment<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministration<s%> they <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3671>professed<s%> <S%G5292>subjection<s%> to the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and for <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G572>liberal<s%> <S%G2842>distribution<s%> to them, and to <S%G3956>all<s%> men;
And by their <S%G1162>prayer<s%> for you, which <S%G1971>long<s%> <S%G1971>after<s%> you for the <S%G5235>exceeding<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in you.
